name: Zampabolas
description: Zampabolas is an unofficial conversion of the classic board game called Hungry Hungry Hippos. The game has only a multiplayer mode (2 to 4 players), and doesn't feature an AI computer player. Players can choose between 2 boards, and can play a 10, 20 or 30 ball game.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, DOS, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
